title: Unban me or refund my money
body: I was banned for toxic chat. Ok chat is chat but Ive spent a lot of money on this game since 2014 and my account is permanently banned? If you're going to do that I would like a refund on my money riot.

replies.body: You agreed when you purchased the RP that it was nonrefundable if your actions resulted in a permanent ban.

You don't get money back for food that you eat at a restaurant, you don't get money back for films watched in a theater.

The content you have in your League account is unlocked for you to be able to use while your account is in good standing - you do not "own" any of the content. Your account is no longer in good standing, and you've been asked to leave the establishment.
Not gonna happen, you agreed to their ToS.
This is the consequence of your actions you will have to live with it.
A permaban is a punishment, not a free name change and ranked reset.
what on gods green earth could be the logic behind this???

when you breakup with someone do you leave all your things or do you take them with you? whether or not they breakup with you you would still take back all your things. If I spent my money on a tv I'm taking my tv... this is bull. Banned for chat because some sensitive players can't handle the truth. whatever riot. 5 years of loyalty down the drain.
